parameters.name: Businessman
parameters.backgroundStory: The Businessman is a visitor at the mansion today. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. . The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the gardener and the Journalist.  The Businessman is an entrepreneur with many industrial companies.He was an investor at Mr.Hamilton’s “Smart Parts” company that was bankrupted by Mr.Hamilton and the Businessman is furious at the huge debt created.  However his companies have life insurance plans agains Mr.Hamilton that would cover all the debts if he died. The Businessman started the day by calling Mr Hamilton on the phone and saying that is coming in to collect some of the money he owned him. Arrived at the house 5 hours ago and the maid opened the door to him. The Businessman bursted through the house shouting and asking for his money back.The butler calmed the businessman 4 hours ago and served the businessman tea and some cookies and led him to the library 3h hours ago and told the businessman to wait there cause Mr.Hamilton had something for him. Mr.Hamilton eventually died and never showed up.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows the journalist is not only a reporter but a shareholder of the media outlet he works for. Knows the Media outlet of the journalist is involved in some of the ruinous ventures of Mr.Hamilton and has much at stake if something comes public. Knows that Investor Grantt, a former business partner of the Businessman and Mr.Hamilton has some shady stuff going on and thinks he might be involved in some wrongdoings of Hamilton. Knows that Mr.Hamilton had a shady project going on but doesn't know much about it.Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters: Background Story = The Businessman is a visitor at the mans…
Events Knowledge = Knows the journalist is not only a repor…

parameters.name: Journalist
parameters.backgroundStory: The Journalist is a visitor at the mansion today. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the Gardener and The Businessman.  The journalist is an awarded journalist at the "Daily Mail" but also the son of Investor Grantt, a life-long partner of Mr.Hamilton but tries to hide that fact as much as possible.. He his at the house to interview Mr.Hamilton with regards to the latest scandal. He was at house a few days ago inquiring Hamilton about his businesses and became aware that something else involving a secret project could be going on. The journalist is also secretly a shareholder at the group holding the "Daily Maily" but avoids to let it be known. The journalist arrived at the house at lunch time and was received by the butler. The butler told him to wait in the living room for Mr.Hamilton and there he interviewed Mr.Hamilton  about the scandal  They were interrupted by the butler claiming The Businessman had arrived and was demanding to see  Mr.Hamilton. Since then the journalist never saw Mr.Hamilton again and heard a bit later that his body was found dead. The Journalist only left the living room to look for a bathroom 2h40 hours ago.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the Businessman is an investor at Mr.hamilton company “Smart Parts”. Today the Journalist met the maid who opened the door to him 4 hours ago. Knows the Businessman companies have life insurance policies against Mr.Hamilton that if triggered would pay all the debts. Knows that everybody in the house has an hidden motive to kill Mr.Hamilton. Knows the wife is probably having an affair since the journalist saw her many times downtown with another influent man called Gustave. . Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now. Knows about Mr.Hamilton's secret project CLUAIDO and his intentions to create simulated digital realities with aritifcial inteligent agents based on real life prototypes but tries to conceal that information as possiblle after a visit to Mr.Hamilton's house last week and where the Journalist had to leave suddenly and left a thanking note to Mr.Hamilton in his study.

parameters.name: butler
parameters.backgroundStory: The Butler has worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for the past 20 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Cook, the Maid, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The butler was Mr. Hamilton’s  most trusted man  and often helped him in his illegal activities carrying money and delivering notes to his counter-parties.The butler has been having a secret affair with the maid for 5 years. The butler is afraid his involvement in his activities will be discovered in court. He and the maid talked about killing him to save themselves and secure some cash that only the butter knows about. The butler spend the morning preparing to recieve the guests later tonight,  4 hours ago the butler led the businessman, who was shouting all over the place to the library and served him some tea. Mr Hamilton then called the butler upstairs to pick up a chest with gold bars to deliver to the businessman. After hearing Mr.Hamilton was dead the butler secretly hid that chest in a drawer in the dinning room.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Mr.Hamilton is being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.Knows the phone call logs are stored in the piano in the living room,. Knows the Cooks family business was ruined by Mr Hamilton long time ago.  Saw the journalist the other day in the house walking around alone but never saw him leaving the house. Knows his valuable personal knife that is usually stored in the visitors room drawer was stolen around the same day as the journalist visited. Saw the wife talking to a lawyer the other day in the study and overheard them talking about inheritances.Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the bookshelf of the study. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.
